backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: replacing RainBackground with SnowfallBackground in App.tsx, and restoring/implementing the full SnowfallBackground component with canvas-based animation and accessibility support.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a snowflakes-themed artistic web page with animated backgrounds, gallery, and winter aesthetic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the React application titled 'Artistic Snowflakes Web Page'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering SnowfallBackground with layered Header, Hero, Gallery, and Footer components in a winter-themed layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, caffeine.ai attribution link with heart icon, and poetic quote about snowflakes.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Gallery component displaying six snowflake images in a responsive grid with hover effects and modal dialogs for detailed viewing with descriptions.
frontend/src/components/HailBackground.t: Empty file placeholder for a hail background component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with 'Crystalline Beauty' title flanked by animated spinning snowflake icons on a frosted glass background.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring poetic prose about snowflakes with elegant typography and winter-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/RainBackground.t: Canvas-based animated rain background with elongated raindrops, devicePixelRatio scaling, density-capped particle count (40-250), resize handling, and prefers-reduced-motion support rendering static frames.
frontend/src/components/SnowfallBackgrou: Canvas-based animated snowfall background with circular particles, soft glow effects, devicePixelRatio support, density-capped count (40-250), and prefers-reduced-motion support for static rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on Internet Identity, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence via AuthClient, and delegation validation with configurable idle/expiry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the application does not require backend queries and uses only static local content.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS with OKLCH design tokens defining a mauve/fuchsia winter-themed color system for both light and dark modes, including custom winter-specific variables for glass effects, borders, and overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color tokens (including winter-specific colors), custom animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the Crystalline Beauty winter-themed landing page architecture, including React/Tailwind composition patterns, ICP integration via hooks, known issues with CSS files and missing dialog component, and a catalog of existing features.
